title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Zydus implemented regulated DR on AWS (NTA320)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Zydus如何在AWS上实施受监管的灾难恢复 (NTA320)
abstract: This session explores Zydus Lifesciences' cloud-driven disaster recovery strategy for safeguarding Terabytes of regulated data across 10+ critical pharma applications. The session details how Zydus achieved < 15 minutes of RPO and < 3 hours of RTO across main Data Center and multiple Plant locations and increased the resiliency of critical Pharma Applications while meeting strict regulatory requirements. We will cover in-depth technical & Network architecture covering AWS Elastic Disaster Recovery (DRS), Elastic Block Storage, Direct Connect & Transit Gateway AWS services.
abstract_cn: 本会议探讨了Zydus Lifesciences的云驱动灾难恢复策略，用于保护10多个关键制药应用程序中TB级的受监管数据。会议详细介绍了Zydus如何在主数据中心和多个工厂位置实现小于15分钟的RPO和小于3小时的RTO，并提高了关键制药应用程序的弹性，同时满足严格的监管要求。我们将深入介绍涵盖AWS Elastic Disaster Recovery (DRS)、Elastic Block Storage、Direct Connect和Transit Gateway等AWS服务的技术和网络架构。
